website_summaries.verdict: A compact LED device that is capable of multiple skin benefits if you combine it with FOREO masks.
pros: Works with the brand's masks by enhancing their effectiveness with LED light and proprietary T-Sonic pulsations to firm and brighten skin while killing bacteria that can lead to breakouts
May also reduce some signs of aging
cons: Not recommended for use without FOREO's masks, so it can get pricey when used as recommended

customer_reviews.title: For real
customer_reviews.text: I read it was fake but go into the FOREO website and have the same price, also after I bought it I did the registration with the Bluetooth inside the app without complications...just need to have patience for it to fully charge before used it first time
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Fake !
customer_reviews.text: This is fake at least the one I received is fake.. I am not even going to open this package.. returning this thing i need my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kinza

customer_reviews.title: Returning for refund. Came with NO masks
customer_reviews.text: I am leaving a review based on my experience, not on how well the product actually works. For $200, this came with nothing! No mask, nothing! For that amount for a device of this nature, they should include masks! I do not want to have to pay an additional amount to purchase masks to be able to try this out. Way too expensive for what you get! Returning for a refund...overpriced hype
customer_reviews.author: Indigo

customer_reviews.title: I'm revived!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical of this product reading the reviews, but let me tell you, I am so glad I went ahead and purchased it. I started with the mini UFO but really wanted the cryo therapy too. It is amazing how awesome and relaxing it is to do these activated mask. And my skin looks so fresh, healthy and revived!!! A total A+ buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I ALSO RECEIVED A FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: It's impressive looking, but it didn't come with a verification card. It's also spotty with bluetooth connections and overheats from the back body of the device really quickly. I suspect the pulsations are weak, but I don't have the real deal yet to compare it to. It was a much better price than anywhere else, so I snapped it up without reading reviews here. I knew I wanted one, why bother? While I wish I had, I will say I had ZERO problems getting a refund from Amazon. I was happy with that. I will buy from a more reputable source such as Sephora, and I recommend you do, too!
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Strayer

customer_reviews.title: waste of money...
customer_reviews.text: i really dont understand why everyone hypes this product up i notice nothing i've been using for a month and see no benefit i bought all the masks as well its all overpriced and does nothing
customer_reviews.author: noelle

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This smart mask is a joke. Comes without any manual. The device requires the app to work and does not hold the charge at all. Its constantly turning off. The mask disc keeps slipping out of the ufo. Also I didn't notice any changes to my skin by using the masks. Waste of money - I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Zaytseva

customer_reviews.title: App works!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: I was wrong. I was clicking on UFO 2 when I have the original UFO. The app is working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Freda W.

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at how much I liked it!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this product, it does everything it says it should! The only thing that makes me hesitant to recommend it is the price. So expensive!! BUT you get what you pay for. Mine came with four different masks, I don't have a negative thing to say about any of them and I really appreciate that it came with different ones so I could try a variety. You can see results immediately and it doesn't take long at all. It also really makes your face feel refreshed. It's a pretty penny to spend on a beauty product, but I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lac

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing... feels good
customer_reviews.text: Interesting product. I find it more relaxing and could see some improvement after one or two weeks. I can find the refills at a local beauty store or here at Amazon. This can easily make a great gift for anyone who wants a smoother, relaxed skin.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, great if you can wait for the lighting deal or sale
customer_reviews.text: It is good for what I needed it for but is a bit complicated to use. It is a bit pricey, luckily there was a lighting deal. It was worth it for the convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Vu Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I received this product with all accompanied masks as a gift for my birthday and it is the best thing that I have ever gotten. I wouldn't have purchased this because of the price, but I find myself using it daily and my skin looks much better. I am thinking of getting one for my mom for Christmas if it goes on sale
customer_reviews.author: MelaninMagic

customer_reviews.title: Foreo UFO will not connect to APP
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device and cannot get it to connect to the app. I have the FOREO Luna and had no problems with connection
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I don’t always have acne but when I do I get a lot. This product helps with making my pores minimize in just one use. It has very sleek packaging and I will continue to use this. So quick and effective and my skin loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MegF

product_meta.title: FOREO UFO Smart Mask Treatment Device with Thermo/Cryo/LED Light Therapy and Sonic Pulsation, Pearl Pink
product_meta.description:
This device works with ufo compatible smart masks. For a few moments every day, ufo whisks you away into a world all your own with technology that delivers stunning results while also providing an indulgent experience for the senses.

BRAND STORY
FOREO is a Swedish multi-national beauty brand established and headquartered Stockholm, Sweden.
